eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Virginia; at 10:43 PM ON DEC 8, 2025 Effective until 12:43 AM DEC 9, 2025. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Virginia Emergency Alert system. In the event of an emergency, this system would bring you important information.
